statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerMarketingROI;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_count FROM InfluencerMarketingROI ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, total_cost FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_count, cost_per_engagement FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE engagement_count > 500 ORDER BY cost_per_engagement ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, total_cost FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_count FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE engagement_count < 500 ORDER BY engagement_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, cost_per_engagement FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE cost_per_engagement BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5 ORDER BY cost_per_engagement;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE total_cost > 5000 AND engagement_count > 2000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC, engagement_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_cost FROM Influencers, Engagements WHERE Influencers.influencer_id = Engagements.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_cost, engagement_date FROM Influencers, Engagements WHERE Influencers.influencer_id = Engagements.influencer_id AND engagement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT influencer_name, followers, engagement_rate FROM Influencers JOIN Engagements ON Influencers.influencer_id = Engagements.influencer_id WHERE engagement_type = 'sponsored_post' AND engagement_cost > 100 ORDER BY followers ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers < 5000 AND engagement_rate < 3.0 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, followers DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_type, engagement_cost FROM Influencers JOIN Engagements ON Influencers.influencer_id = Engagements.influencer_id ORDER BY engagement_cost DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT influencer_name, engagement_date FROM Influencers JOIN Engagements ON Influencers.influencer_id = Engagements.influencer_id WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, cost_amount FROM influencers JOIN costs ON influencers.id = costs.influencer_id WHERE cost_amount < 100;
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM influencers JOIN costs ON influencers.id = costs.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, engagements.engagement_date, engagements.engagement_type FROM influencers JOIN engagements ON influencers.id = engagements.influencer_id WHERE influencers.engagement_rate > 5;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, engagements.engagement_date, costs.cost_amount FROM influencers JOIN engagements ON influencers.id = engagements.influencer_id JOIN costs ON influencers.id = costs.influencer_id WHERE engagements.engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, influencer_id, engagement_type, engagement_cost FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_cost > 500;
SELECT campaign_id, total_engagements, total_cost, ROI_percentage FROM ROI WHERE total_engagements > 50 ORDER BY ROI_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT id, engagement_type, engagement_cost FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_engagements, total_cost, ROI_percentage FROM ROI WHERE ROI_percentage > 50 ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_budget FROM campaign WHERE campaign_budget > 5000
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget, campaign_end_date FROM campaign WHERE campaign_end_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_type FROM engagement WHERE engagement_type LIKE 'comment%' ORDER BY influencer_id ASC
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE campaign_budget > 1000
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM engagement WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-06-30'

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, amount_spent FROM influencer JOIN spending ON influencer.influencer_id = spending.influencer_id JOIN campaign ON spending.campaign_id = campaign.campaign_id ORDER BY amount_spent DESC
